description: Makerdiary recently introduced the iMX RT1011 Nano Kit, a compact, high-performance development board featuring NXP’s iMX RT1011 Crossover MCU. With an Arm Cortex-M7 core running at up to 500 MHz, it delivers strong CPU performance and real-time responsiveness The iMX RT1011 Nano Kit includes 128 KB of on-chip RAM, configurable as Tightly Coupled Memory or […]
title: Low-cost Makerdiary board with iMX RT1011 Crossover MCU and Zephyr Support
